creator: Upflix Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If you are a Netflix user, Upflix is just perfect for you!

Netflix has a fantastic and huge title catalog and it is easy get lost in so many possibilities when choosing what to watch. But Upflix has a solution that will blow your mind and help surf on Netflix like a boss.

Upflix is a versatile tool to help Netflix users sending, directly to your Android device, in real time, all the new titles, series and documentaries arriving on the service. You will get fast access to everything the is new on Netflix catalog.

The Roulette Mode helps you choose a movie on Netflix when you don't know what to watch. Just create your filters based on Netflix categories, Netflix, IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes scores and Upflix will suggest something of your liking.

If you're a fan of a particular actor or director, Upflix offers a great way to search through Netflix vast actors base and will allow you to find all of their titles.

Get updates via notifications and share your favourite Netflix titles with your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email and SMS.

Note: Upflix is not associated or affiliated with Netflix, Inc. Upflix is not part of Netflix , Inc. or have any connection with them whatsoever, nor power over what goes in or out of their catalog.

title: Upflix - Netflix Updates

creator: Upflix Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If you are a Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® or an Apple tv+® user, Upflix is just perfect for you!

They all have has a fantastic and huge catalog combined, with amazing movies and series, and it is easy get lost in so many possibilities when choosing what to watch. But Upflix has a solution that will blow your mind and help you surf on Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® and Apple tv+® like a boss.

Upflix is a versatile tool to help users sending, directly to your iOS device, in real time, all the new movies, series, episodes and documentaries arriving on the service. You will get fast access to everything the is new the catalog.

The Roulette Mode helps you choose movies and series on Netflix when you don't know what to watch. Just create your filters based on categories, IMDB, TMDB and Rotten Tomatoes scores and Upflix will suggest something of your liking.

If you're a fan of a particular actor or director, Upflix offers a great way to search through Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® and Apple tv+® vast actors base and will allow you to find all of their movies and shows.

Get updates via notifications and share your favourite Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® and Apple tv+® movies with your friends.

Note: Upflix is NOT associated or affiliated with Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® nor Apple tv+®. Upflix is NOT part of Netflix®, Disney+®, Prime Video®, HBO Max® and Apple tv+® or have any connection with them whatsoever, nor power over what gets in or out of their catalog.
descriptionShort: Surfing movies on Netflix, Disney, HBO and Prime Video like never before.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Completely new version with Amazon Prime Video, HBO Max, Disney+, Star+ and Apple TV+
- Lots of bug fixes

creator: Upflix Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If you're an avid subscriber of Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, Hulu, or Apple TV+, Upflix is the perfect companion app for you! As a dedicated fan of movies and TV shows, you'll find Upflix to be a fantastic tool to enhance your streaming experience across Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, and HBO Max.

Please note that Upflix is NOT a streaming service, and it does not play movies or TV shows directly. Instead, it works as an invaluable resource for organizing and discovering content across Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, and Apple TV+.

These platforms offer a combined catalog of phenomenal movies and TV shows, with countless options that can sometimes make it challenging to decide what to watch. Upflix offers a mind-blowing solution that will revolutionize the way you browse Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, and Apple TV+.

As a versatile tool, Upflix is designed to assist users by sending real-time updates directly to your device, providing you with immediate access to all the new movies, TV shows, episodes, and documentaries arriving on Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, and Apple TV+. With Upflix, you'll always be in the loop about the latest additions to the catalog of movies and TV shows across these streaming platforms.

One of the standout features of Upflix is the Roulette Mode, which is perfect for those moments when you're unsure about what to watch on Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, or HBO Max. By creating personalized filters based on categories, IMDB, TMDB, and Rotten Tomatoes scores, Upflix will generate tailored suggestions for movies and TV shows that align with your preferences.

If you're a fan of specific actors or directors, Upflix's comprehensive search functionality lets you dive into the vast actors' base across Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, and Apple TV+. Find all the movies and TV shows featuring your favorite stars and creators, and explore the entire catalog with ease.

Stay updated with notifications from Upflix, and never miss out on the latest Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, and HBO Max movies and TV shows. Share your favorite picks with friends and fellow enthusiasts, fostering a sense of community around the content you love.

It's important to note that Upflix is NOT associated or affiliated with Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime Video, HBO Max, or Apple TV+. Upflix operates independently and is not a part of Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, or Apple TV+, nor does it have any connections or influence over their catalog.

In summary, Upflix is your ultimate companion for optimizing your experience with Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, and HBO Max. With its features designed to help you discover and organize the vast selection of movies and TV shows, you'll be able to navigate your streaming platforms like a pro.

Whether you're in the mood for a blockbuster movie on Netflix, a critically acclaimed TV show on HBO Max, an animated classic from Disney, or a gripping drama series on Prime Video, Upflix has you covered. Don't waste any more time browsing through endless menus; let Upflix streamline your streaming experience and connect you with the content you'll love across Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, and HBO Max.

Enhance your movie nights, TV show binges, and lazy afternoons with Upflix, and make the most out of your Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, and HBO Max subscriptions. With Upflix by your side, you'll be fully equipped to explore the ever-expanding universe of movies and TV shows available on these popular streaming platforms.

Stay ahead in the streaming era with Upflix - your ultimate guide to movies and series on the top streaming platforms. If you're a subscriber to Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, HBO Max, or Apple TV+, Upflix is perfect for you!

All of them have a fantastic and huge combined catalog, with amazing movies and series, and it's easy to get lost in so many possibilities when choosing what to watch.
